ANML

The Studio

Where it happens

Our home is at the base of the Santa Cruz mountains, in historic downtown Los Gatos. It’s scenic, serene—and just 30 minutes from the surf and steps away from the trails. We get constant inspiration from working where innovative Silicon Valley meets the backdrop of the great outdoors.

Contact Us

Stop by or hit us up

50 University Ave. B312
Los Gatos, CA 95030

info@anml.com
669.444.0412
Join Our Team

The
ANML
Crew

We are a band of design geeks, beat junkies, and problem solvers who genuinely like each other. When we’re not whiteboarding or perfecting pixels, we’re checking out live shows, exploring our natural habitat, or spending time with our families.

The workspace

Zip-lining through the Redwoods
Team rafting on American River
Meet our mascot: Coal
Heavenly

We’re always looking for fun, talented people to join our crew. Give us a shout at jobs@anml.com

The Habitat

Los Gatos

Right outside our office, we’ve got great coffee, tons of food options, a drink spot—even a trail for a mountain bike break or a walking conference call. Stop on by and we’ll give you a tour. If you’re lucky, we’ll even take you to our second home, Blue Line Pizza. Or if we’re celebrating, the bar located conveniently below our desks.

Downtown Los Gatos
The ANML Den
Blue Line Pizza
Follow Us

in the wild

Design obsessed? Get your fix: Sample our freshest pixel concoctions, take a spin through our older work, and keep tabs on what we’re up to.
